title: Unfunded mandate from the Disabilities Act

content.question: The Americans with Disabilities Act was widely unpopular with governors and mayors because it

choices.label: required that people with disabilities be given equal access to public facilities
required that buildings be retrofitted or remodeled to give equal access to people with disabilities
did not go far enough to establish equal access to public facilities
applied only to federal facilities and did nothing to accommodate people in municipal buildings
required that states and cities pay for federally mandated construction and remodeling

content.answer: required that states and cities pay for federally mandated construction and remodeling
